title: Create v0.2.0 git tag and GitHub release
description:
**As a** project maintainer
**I want** to create an official v0.2.0 release
**So that** users can download and reference a stable version

**Context:**
After all pre-release tickets are complete:
1. Create annotated git tag v0.2.0
2. Push tag to GitHub
3. Create GitHub release with release notes
4. Publish to PyPI

This ticket focuses on git tagging and GitHub release creation.

**Technical Notes:**
- Use annotated tags (not lightweight): `git tag -a v0.2.0 -m "Release v0.2.0"`
- Tag message should summarize release
- GitHub release should include:
  - Release notes from CHANGELOG.md
  - Installation instructions
  - Upgrade notes
  - Link to documentation
- Consider pre-release flag if still testing

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** all v0.2.0 tickets are complete
**When** I create the git tag
**Then** an annotated tag v0.2.0 exists with descriptive message

**Given** the tag is created
**When** I push to GitHub
**Then** the tag appears in the releases page

**Given** I create a GitHub release
**When** users visit releases page
**Then** v0.2.0 is listed with complete release notes

**Testing Considerations:**
- Verify tag is annotated (not lightweight)
- Check tag message is descriptive
- Ensure release notes are formatted properly on GitHub
- Test download links work
- Verify installation instructions are accurate

**Implementation Hints:**
```bash
# 1. Ensure all changes committed
git status

# 2. Create annotated tag
git tag -a v0.2.0 -m "Release v0.2.0: First public release

Major features:
- Complete TUI with conversation history
- CLI commands (ask, chat, history, config)
- Multi-provider AI support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Ollama)
- Tool calling system with safety controls
- Comprehensive documentation

See CHANGELOG.md for full details."

# 3. Push tag
git push origin v0.2.0

# 4. Create GitHub release via web UI or gh CLI
gh release create v0.2.0 \
  --title "v0.2.0 - First Public Release" \
  --notes-file CHANGELOG.md \
  --discussion-category "Announcements"
```

**Dependencies:**
- SOUL-214: Version update must be complete
- SOUL-217: CHANGELOG.md must be updated
- SOUL-213, SOUL-215, SOUL-218, SOUL-219: All cleanup complete
